articles.description: WI vs SA, 5th T20I: An umpiring decision shocked South Africa greats AB de Villiers and Dale Steyn and they posted tweets to show disappointment.
articles.content: South Africa greats AB de Villiers and Dale Steyn reacted to an on-field umpire's decision as a short-pitched delivery that finished well outside the leg stump of SA batsman Wiaan Mulder was not rule… [+1446 chars]

articles.author: Press Trust of India
articles.title: IPL Will Wear Out UAE Pitches Ahead Of T20 World Cup, Says South Africa Coach Mark Boucher - NDTV Sports
articles.description: With the IPL and T20 World Cup 2021 scheduled to be completed mostly in the UAE, South Africa coach Mark Boucher said the pitches will be "a bit dry" and spinners will play "a massive role".
articles.content: The remainder of Indian Premier League being held in the United Arab Emirates will hugely affect the pitches, which might get worn out and help the spinners "massively" during ICC T20 World Cup, feel… [+1559 chars]
